name: <core_simd::vector::Simd<usize, 4> as core_simd::to_bytes::ToBytes>::from_be_bytes

core_simd::to_bytes::ToBytes::from_ne_by.doc:
Creates a native endian integer value from its memory representation as a byte array
 in native endianness.

core_simd::simd::num::uint::SimdUint::sw.doc: Reverses the byte order of each element.
